definition: relating to or resembling a medusa, one of two forms that coelenterates take: it is the free-swimming sexual phase in the life cycle of a coelenterate
details:
adjective
- relating to or resembling a medusa
noun
- one of two forms that coelenterates take: it is the free-swimming sexual phase in the life cycle of a coelenterate
= synonyms: medusa, medusan
